title: How to Give a Command in Fortnite

steps.title: Hire a Specialist Character.
steps.content: Hire a Specialist Character. In a Fortnite match , you can hire Specialist Characters to aid yourself and your team. Each character offers different abilities and services, and these characters will change with every new season. To hire a character, speak to them, and then select the icon of the character's head with a + . This will cost Gold. For the current Chapter 4, Season 4, you can hire: Bull Shark (Scout Specialist): located at Creeky Compound Royale Bomber (Supply Specialist): located at Brutal Bastion Beastmode (Heavy Specialist): located at Breakwater Bay Sun Strider (Medic Specialist): located South of Eclipsed State Nolan Chance (Quest): located at Frenzy Fields Piper Pace (Quest): located at Slappy Shores Hiring a Specialist Character can help, especially if you're trying to get better at the game.

steps.title: Open the Follower Communications wheel.
steps.content: Open the Follower Communications wheel. This will vary depending on the device you're using. [1] X Research source On PC or Mac : Hold down the Middle mouse button . This is the scroll wheel. On Xbox, PlayStation 4/5, or Switch : Hold the Left button on the D-pad. If this button isn't working, check your keyboard control in Settings → Keyboard Controls → Communication .

steps.title: Select a command.
steps.content: Select a command. Use your mouse or right stick to highlight the command, and then release all buttons to select it. You can give the following commands: Move (pinpoint icon): Tell the Specialist Character to move where your crosshair currently points at. Wait (open hand icon): Tell the Specialist Character to wait where they currently stand. Follow (curved left arrow icon): Tell the Specialist Character to follow you around. Dismiss (X icon): "Fires" your Specialist Character so you can hire another one or continue on solo.
